channel.title: How to make voting points reward? (CodeUsa) {Pulse Pk)
channel.description: Okay so i wanna give my players a reward for voting..how could i keep track of their points ingame and make a shop where they can spend those points on stuff???? someone please help..im offering cash for helping or rs acocunt or staff in my server
